fullText: This musical biography of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons is a crowd-pleasing entertainment that manages to be both slick and heartfelt.
dtliExcerpt: This musical biography of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons is a crowd-pleasing entertainment that manages to be both slick and heartfelt.
